archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.3c: c) supplement passwords (e.g. by using additional authentication, such as biometrics or tokens), when necessary, such as for accounts with special access privileges
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
